Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the lantibiotics family (Class I bacteriocin)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: The structural data indicate that NAI-112 is a 22-aa, neutrally charged, glycosylated lanthipeptide containing N-terminal Lab and C-terminal MeLab residues separated by a 4-aa linker. It carries a 6-deoxyhexose moiety N-linked to a tryptophan residue. NAI-112 represents the ?rst occurrence of a lanthipeptide containing a MeLab and an N-glycosylation. NAI-112 and labyrinthopeptin A2 share a similar ring topology.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: A glycosylated, labionin-containing lanthipeptide with marked antinociceptive activity.
Literature.Author: Iorio M, Sasso O, Maffioli SI, Bertorelli R, Monciardini P, Sosio M, Bonezzi F, Summa M, Brunati C, Bordoni R, Corti G, Tarozzo G, Piomelli D, Reggiani A, Donadio S.
